meanings.definition: Existing or occurring before the feudal system.
meanings.sent1: The prefeudal village had a simple social structure.
meanings.sent2: Historians study prefeudal societies to understand their development.
meanings.sent3: The prefeudal customs seemed quaint to the modern observer.
meanings.sent4: In the prefeudal era, power dynamics were vastly different.
meanings.sent5: The prefeudal landscape was untouched by the feudal order.

meanings.definition: Relating to a time period prior to feudalism.
meanings.sent1: The prefeudal artifacts provided insights into ancient cultures.
meanings.sent2: Prefeudal traditions were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The prefeudal fashion choices were quite intriguing.
meanings.sent4: Her prefeudal mindset clashed with the modern world.
meanings.sent5: The prefeudal architecture showcased intricate designs.
